# http://sergeivolodin.github.io llms.txt

- [Sergei Volodin's Portfolio](https://sergeivolodin.github.io/): Sergei Volodin's portfolio showcasing projects in AI, AR, and robotics.
- [EPFL Labs Overview](https://sergeivolodin.github.io/epfl-labs): Overview of EPFL labs with tag clouds from research papers.
